#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
int main()
{
   int t,k,p,q;
   scanf("%d",&t);
   char rev[]="zyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba";
   while(t--)
   {
       scanf("%d",&k);
       p=k/25;
       q=k%25;
       if(q!=0)
       {
          while(q>=0)
          {
          printf("%c",rev[25-q]);
           q--;
          }
       }
       while(p--)
       printf("%s",rev);

       printf("\n");
   }
return 0;
}
